alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:26PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Wheatland and north central Golden Valley Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 25 miles northwest of Deadmans Basin Reservoir to 9 miles west of Harlowton. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain, winds in excess of 40 mph and accumulating pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Accumulating pea-sized hail and water on the roads were creating hazardous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Harlowton, Judith Gap and Twodot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
